channel.title: Portwarding - Only 1 Person Can Connect
channel.description:
Hey, i have portfowarded and it says my ports are open but it can't ping my router. I ran my source and connected with clicnt. Then, when i logged out, i couldn't re-connect untill ir estarted server again. this has happened to me with 5 different clients and sources, I am using a Belkin router - maybe my firewall is blocking something? :S
Firewall > WAN Ping Blocking ADVANCED FEATURE! You can configure the Router not to respond to an ICMP Ping (ping to the WAN port). This offers a heightened level of security. More Info Block ICMP Ping > Enabled
[URL=http://img691.imageshack.us/i/routerj.png/][IMG]http://img691.imageshack.us/img691/7389/routerj.png[/img][/URL] Thanks,

item.title: Portwarding - Only 1 Person Can Connect
item.dc:creator: @pk_owned_u pk owned u
item.description:
@pk_owned_u wrote:

Hey, i have portfowarded and it says my ports are open but it can’t ping my router.
I ran my source and connected with clicnt. Then, when i logged out, i couldn’t re-connect untill ir estarted server again. this has happened to me with 5 different clients and sources,
I am using a Belkin router - maybe my firewall is blocking something? :S

Firewall > WAN Ping Blocking

ADVANCED FEATURE! You can configure the Router not to respond to an ICMP Ping (ping to the WAN port). This offers a heightened level of security. More Info

Block ICMP Ping > Enabled

Thanks,
